text: Harry Edward Melling (born 13 March 1989) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Dudley Dursley in the Harry Potter films. ==Early life== Melling was born in London. He became a member of the Millfield Theatre Youth Drama Group when he turned 9. ==Career== Melling appeared in five of the Harry Potter films as Harry Potter's cousin Dudley Dursley. After the Harry Potter films ended Melling went to Lamda drama school. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Actors from London Category:British child actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Living people
title: Harry Melling
